column6: TWO THE HARD WAY PART 2 Black Panther and Luke Cage must battle an army of ninjas and their master, a mythic arch-villain who has plans for the King of Wakanda. Guest starring: Falcon and Shang Chi, Master of Kung Fu!
column8: | penciller (cover):Mike Deodato | penciller:Scot Eaton | letterer:Randy Gentile | writer:Reginald Hudlin | inker:Klaus Janson | colorist:Dean White
